attributes.action: Have better no smoking rules at kings mill hospital
attributes.additional_details: I have to walk my premature babies right through smoke to get to the hospital , they claim they have a strict no smoking policy yet when I was on the birthing ward all I could smell was smoke coming through the windows because people were smoking below it, the hospital needs to have someone out there watching because there’s always people smoking right next to the no smoking signs, every time I have a appointment for my twins I have to push them through smoke this needs to stop.
attributes.background: kings mill hospital has signs all outside saying ‘no smoking’ this does nothing you walk to the hospital, you see over 30 people smoking some pregnant some with drips attached to them,the birthing ward is right above we’re people smoke with the windows open so smoke goes straight up to the birthing
